20110105234259.000|20110105234302.000|TR0|this was shoddy science. They're saying

20110105234308.000|20110105234310.000|TR0|

20110105234312.000|20110105234314.000|TR0|Wolf.  The paper is about vaccines and 
20110105234314.000|20110105234316.000|TR0|their connection with autism.  And

20110105234333.000|20110105234335.000|TR0|symptoms.  Sometimes it was before the
